Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (64-bit) or equivalent (e.g., Fedora, Arch Linux)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3330 (dual-core, 1.8 GHz or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or equivalent with OpenGL 3.3+ support
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ALSA-compatible sound card or PulseAudio support
  • VR Support: Heck no boy
  • Additional Notes: Hypothetically equivalent to 2013 Macbook air. Not 100% accurate.
